context_of_use: This use case allows users to download reports for offline analysis and record-keeping.
stakeholders_and_interests: user: access to offline data analysis
description: Allow users to download reports for offline analysis and record-keeping.
triggering_event: User requests to download a report.
preconditions: User is logged in to the system.
User has permission to download reports.
postconditions: Report is saved in the user's device.
assumptions: Users have access to the necessary reports to download.
Users are familiar with the download process.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to download reports.
The system shall ensure that downloaded reports are accessible offline.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for download.
main_flow: 1. User requests to download a report → System presents available reports for download.
2. User selects a report to download → System initiates the download process.
3. User confirms the download → System downloads the report to the user's device.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If no reports are available, then the system displays a message indicating that no reports are available for download.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the report is not available, then the system displays an error message indicating unavailability.
